summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, authorizing the execution of permit agreements with United Community Antenna Systems, dba Viacom Cablevision, and Electric Lightwave, Inc. to use space in the City's underwater pipeline tunnel, known as the Lake Union Tunnel, located in Lake Union, beginning at approximately 7th Avenue Northeast and Northeast Northlake Way, and ending under the south end of the University Bridge, for placement of fiber optic cable.
